snippet: Every two weeks, T exclusively presents a new installation from the artist’s video series entitled “Things I’m (Probably) Not Going to Get Done for the Biennial.”
abstract: Every two weeks, T exclusively presents a new installation from the artist’s video series entitled “Things I’m (Probably) Not Going to Get Done for the Biennial.”

headline.main: Art Matters | Darren Bader's Video Contribution to the 2014 Whitney Biennial
